description: Try our easy to follow Berry Pancake Tacos recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Low salt,Soy free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Berry Pancake Tacos Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 120g Bonne Maman Blackberry Conserve, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: For the pancakes, whisk together dry ingredients in a medium sized bowl. Mix together wet ingredients in a separate smaller bowl
Pour the wet ingredients into the bowl of dry ingredients and whisk together until there are no lumps. Set aside
Heat a large non-stick pan over medium heat and brush pan with a bit of butter
Pour 2-3 rounds of batter into the pan at a time, depending on pan size, leaving space in between each of them
Once you see bubbles on the surface and the bottom is golden, flip over and cook for another 30 seconds â€“ 1 minute
Spread Bonne Maman Blackberry Conserve generously on one side of each pancake
Slightly fold into shape of taco and add your choice of berries and whipped cream to top!
